featured.title: Featured Properties
featured.subtitle: Discover our exclusive selection of premium properties in the most sought-after locations

process.title: A Simple, Transparent Process
process.subtitle: We've streamlined the property search into three clear, manageable steps

step1.title: Find Your Property
step1.description: Browse our curated selection of premium properties that match your criteria and preferences.

step2.title: Schedule a Viewing
step2.description: Book a visit with one of our expert agents who will provide in-depth property analysis.

step3.title: Complete the Process
step3.description: Our team handles everything from offer to closing with expert negotiation and support.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive real estate solutions tailored to your needs
services.buyDesc: Find your dream home from our exclusive listings.
services.sellDesc: Get the best price for your property with our expert marketing.
services.rentDesc: Discover rental properties that match your lifestyle.
services.valuationDesc: Get an accurate market valuation for your property.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our clients have to say about their experience with us.

1.content: Monopolis made finding our dream home effortless. Their team was professional and attentive to our needs throughout the entire process.

2.content: The market insights and property recommendations were spot on. I've expanded my portfolio significantly thanks to Monopolis.

3.content: Sold my property above asking price within a week! The team's marketing strategy was impressive.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest listings and market insights
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Dream Home?

footer.description: A boutique real estate agency with 4-5 dedicated agents committed to finding your perfect property in Belgium.
